definition: to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

sentences.english: The salesperson said it was a famous world brand.
sentences.chinese: 那个售货员说是世界名牌呢。

sentences.english: It just happens that we need a few salesmen now to replace those who are on vacation .
sentences.chinese: 现在赶巧我们需要几位售货员代替那些现在度假的。

sentences.english: Boy, that salesman was the biggest airhead I've ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 好家伙，那个男孩售货员是我见过的最愚蠢的人。

sentences.english: "You should give that money to charity, " said the sales girl.
sentences.chinese: 那女售货员说，“你应该把钱给慈善商店。”

sentences.english: The shop assistants in this bookstore are ever ready FOR inquiry and service.
sentences.chinese: 这家书店的售货员百问不厌，百拿不烦。

sentences.english: What should you do if the salesperson refuses to repair or replace it?
sentences.chinese: 如果售货员拒绝修理或退换你应该做什么？

sentences.english: the assistant will give you change. We always say a dollar note (banknote)
When you're shopping for running shoes, make sure the salesperson measures your feet.
sentences.chinese: 当你在选购跑鞋时一定要让售货员测量自己的脚码。

sentences.english: The salesman led us on about the quality of the product so that Iwould buy it.
sentences.chinese: 售货员诱使我们相信产品的质量以便我买他的产品。

sentences.english: The salesman duped her into buying a faulty computer.
sentences.chinese: 那个售货员骗她买下了一台有毛病的电脑。

sentences.english: This saleman is very skilled at wrapping gifts..
sentences.chinese: 这个售货员很擅长包装礼物。

sentences.english: The salesman demonstrated (how to use) the washing-machine.
sentences.chinese: 售货员表演了如何使用这种洗衣机。

sentences.english: The salesperson Behaving civilly toward customers can get Business.
sentences.chinese: 售货员礼貌待客能赢得生意。

sentences.english: "Third door on the left." the woman replied with a smile.
sentences.chinese: “左边第三个门，”女售货员笑眯眯地回答。

sentences.english: The witness asserted that the salesman was dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 目击者断言那售货员是不诚实的。

definition: variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
